Articles.Content: How do I patch a stock LFO engine to use multiple fuels like Methalox and Hydrolox??

That's probably outside the scope of the stock model switcher. I mean, I don't know for sure, but I bet it is so. Squad has no need to implement such a thing, after all, since no stock engine needs it.

So your first step would be to locate a mod that has that functionality. And then you'll need to learn how to use the mod to make it happen. Perhaps B9PartSwitch can do it? It can certainly do a lot.
